BitField.name: RST
BitField.description: Write 1 to reset the ADC DMA

Register.name: ADC_DMAMSAR
Register.description: ADC DMA memory start address register

Register.name: ADC_DMANDTR
Register.description: ADC DMA number of data to transfer register

Register.name: ADC_DMAMNAR
Register.description: ADC DMA memory next address register

Register.name: ADC_DMACNDTR
Register.description: ADC DMA count number of data transferred register

BitField.name: SEL
BitField.description: selects PC_TRACE source on bb_debug GPIO pins

BitField.name: TUNE
BitField.description: Frequency trim setting for HF RC oscillator

BitField.name: MODE
BitField.description: Sets clock to be measured by CLK_PERIOD

BitField.name: EN
BitField.description: MHz crystal oscillator is main clock

BitField.name: GPIO
BitField.description: Enable filter on GPIO wakeup sources enabled by the PWR_WAKEPxR registers

BitField.name: SC1
BitField.description: Enable filter on GPIO wakeup source SC1 (PB2)

BitField.name: SC2
BitField.description: Enable filter on GPIO wakeup source SC2 (PA2)

BitField.name: IRQD
BitField.description: Enable filter on GPIO wakeup source EXTI D

Register.name: SC1_DMARXBEGADDAR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA begin address channel A register

Register.name: SC1_DMARXENDADDAR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA end address channel A register

Register.name: SC1_DMARXBEGADDBR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA begin address channel B register

Register.name: SC1_DMARXENDADDBR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA end address channel B register

Register.name: SC1_DMATXBEGADDAR
Register.description: Serial controller transmit DMA begin address channel A register

Register.name: SC1_DMATXENDADDAR
Register.description: Serial controller transmit DMA end address channel A register

Register.name: SC1_DMATXBEGADDBR
Register.description: Serial controller transmit DMA begin address channel B register

Register.name: SC1_DMATXENDADDBR
Register.description: Serial controller transmit DMA end address channel B

Register.name: SC1_DMARXCNTAR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA counter channel A register

Register.name: SC1_DMARXCNTBR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA count channel B register

Register.name: SC1_DMATXCNTR
Register.description: Serial controller transmit DMA counter register

Register.name: SC1_DMARXERRAR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA channel A first error register

Register.name: SC1_DMARXERRBR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA channel B first error register

Register.name: SC1_DMARXCNTSAVEDR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA saved counter channel B register

Register.name: SC1_UARTBRR1
Register.description: Serial controller UART baud rate register 1

Register.name: SC1_UARTBRR2
Register.description: Serial controller UART baud rate register 2

Register.name: SC2_DMARXBEGADDAR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA begin address channel A register

Register.name: SC2_DMARXENDADDAR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA end address channel A register

Register.name: SC2_DMARXBEGADDBR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA begin address channel B register

Register.name: SC2_DMARXENDADDBR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA end address channel B register

Register.name: SC2_DMATXBEGADDAR
Register.description: Serial controller transmit DMA begin address channel A register

Register.name: SC2_DMATXENDADDAR
Register.description: Serial controller transmit DMA end address channel A register

Register.name: SC2_DMATXBEGADDBR
Register.description: Serial controller transmit DMA begin address channel B register

Register.name: SC2_DMATXENDADDBR
Register.description: Serial controller transmit DMA end address channel B register

Register.name: SC2_DMARXCNTAR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA counter channel A register

Register.name: SC2_DMARXCNTBR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA count channel B register

Register.name: SC2_DMATXCNTR
Register.description: Serial controller transmit DMA counter register

Register.name: SC2_DMARXERRAR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA channel A first error register

Register.name: SC2_DMARXERRBR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA channel B first error register

Register.name: SC2_DMARXCNTSAVEDR
Register.description: Serial controller receive DMA saved counter channel B register

BitField.name: RELOAD
BitField.description: Value to load into the SYST_CVR when the counter is enabled and when it reaches 0

BitField.name: CURRENT
BitField.description: The current value of the SysTick counter

BitField.name: NOREF
BitField.description: Indicates whether the device provides a reference clock to the processor

BitField.name: SKEW
BitField.description: Indicates whether the TENMS value is exact

BitField.name: TENMS
BitField.description: Reload value for 10ms (100Hz) timing, subject to system clock skew errors

BitField.name: VECTPENDING
BitField.description: Indicates the exception number of the highest priority pending enabled exception

Register.name: AIRCR
Register.description: Application Interrupt and Reset Control Register

BitField.name: SLEEPDEEP
BitField.description: Controls whether the processor uses sleep or deep sleep as its low power mode

BitField.name: SLEEPONEXIT
BitField.description: Indicates sleep-on-exit when returning from Handler mode to Thread mode

BitField.name: STKALIGN
BitField.description: Indicates stack alignment on exception entry

Register.name: SHCSR
Register.description: System Handler Control and State Register
